mapper.insert: insert into sea_co_url (uid, cid, tid, url, pic, succ, err, cotype) values (#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{tid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{url,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{pic,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{succ,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{err,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cotype,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.update: update sea_co_url set cid = #{cid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, tid = #{tid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, url = #{url,jdbcType=CHAR}, pic = #{pic,jdbcType=CHAR}, succ = #{succ,jdbcType=CHAR}, err = #{err,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cotype = #{cotype,jdbcType=TINYINT} where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select uid, cid, tid, url, pic, succ, err, cotype from sea_co_url
